grape.embiggen.sequences.word2vec_sequence package¶

Submodules¶

grape.embiggen.sequences.word2vec_sequence.Word2VecSequence module¶

Keras Sequence object for running CBOW and SkipGram on texts.

grape.embiggen.sequences.word2vec_sequence.Word2VecSequence.batch_size¶

Return batch size property of the sequence.

grape.embiggen.sequences.word2vec_sequence.Word2VecSequence.elapsed_epochs¶

Return elapsed epochs since training started.

grape.embiggen.sequences.word2vec_sequence.Word2VecSequence.sample_number¶

Return total number of samples in sequence.

grape.embiggen.sequences.word2vec_sequence.Word2VecSequence.steps_per_epoch¶

Number of steps to execute on the sequence.

Module contents¶

Keras Sequence object for running CBOW and SkipGram on texts.
